vsParam: Humph... It seems you have made it successfully.

Hey, don't get cocky.
Gosh, that's exactly why I hate humans...

Hehe, but you did it anyway.
Have faith in yourself.

Is this the item that could take the dragon down!?

If so, I'd have told you that at the very start.
This is just a beginning.

This item serves another purpose... Namely,
to wake up the monster sealed deep in the Fairyland.
There live such monsters... in... in this Fairyland?

If we could take down that monster and get its horn,
we could make an item that could take down the dragon. But...

That monster is beyond powerful... We failed to
take it down even when we were young, so we had to seal it.

That's true... Humans, are you ready to wake up
and defeat such a powerful monster?
Yeah! After all, we need to defeat that dragon at last!

Hehe, we can count it on you.
I'm sure you'll be fine.

If anything happens, Lord Thunbergia will take care of it.
